channel.title: Viturix - Creating a new standard
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Viturix[/size][/center]
[center][i]Credits to Raw Envy for the Base[/i][/center]
[center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][url=http://seal-team.net/ticketcenter]Ticket Center[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://seal-team.net/smf]Forums[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][url=http://seal-team.net/play/play.html]Play Now[/url]
Here are some features
[size=14pt][b][u]Recent Updates:[/u][/b][/size] 100% Chaos Tunnels 100% Melzars Maze Working on Achievement system
[size=12pt][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size] Flawless item switching configured both server and client sided Perfected combat (Main feature to be honest, it's an amazing combat base just needs a few bugs fixing but all formulas and pretty damn flawless) Good stability (I held 125 players on a 1GB ram Vps) All updated interfaces with correct hovers and such Unique feautures A skill base for all skills and some skills worked on
(Bosses) - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - 85% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows{prizes glitchy still} & More...
Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
Random Stuff: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that
Armours/Bosses: - All new 711 armours obv we all know - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now - Quests are partially made[/center]
[IMG]http://i1156.photobucket.com/albums/p561/0osap/sever2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1156.photobucket.com/albums/p561/0osap/sever1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1156.photobucket.com/albums/p561/0osap/server6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1156.photobucket.com/albums/p561/0osap/server3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1156.photobucket.com/albums/p561/0osap/Server14.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1156.photobucket.com/albums/p561/0osap/Sever13.png[/img]
[center]Why should you choose to play Viturix over other servers? A very good question.. But a very simple answer Viturix cares about it's players, it cares about it's economy, it cares about how the server is ran and what the players suggest and what they want. We do every we possible can to ensure the players of Viturix enjoy playing the game and get the most friendly, fun and enjoyable game play they can!
The server does frequent and daily updates almost every day, you can view all/most of the updates that happen on Viturix on the update-log. Viturix focus's on every players enjoyment, we have every aspect of game-play that we know players enjoy PvM, PvP, skilling, you name it we have it! We are not like other servers which are ignorant to there players and just ignores there opinions and even ignores there players when they talk to them.. I have played over 50 servers over the past 4 years and have watched very carefully how the best servers are ran and also how to bad servers are ran, I have learnt there mistakes and adapted to how the best servers are ran which is why Viturix is the place for you.[/center]
inb4 leeched

item.title: Viturix - Creating a new standard
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

Edge as a home with the usual thieving stalls along the fence is not setting a new standard, but the rest of the features and ethics look like they are coming along nicely. Good luck with your future goals.

Read full topic

item.title: Viturix - Creating a new standard
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[center][size=24pt]Viturix[/size][/center]

[center]Credits to Raw Envy for the Base[/center]

[center]

Ticket Center
Forums
Play Now

Here are some features

[size=14pt]Recent Updates:[/size]
100% Chaos Tunnels
100% Melzars Maze
Working on Achievement system

[size=12pt]Features:[/size]
Flawless item switching configured both server and client sided
Perfected combat (Main feature to be honest, it’s an amazing combat base just needs a few bugs fixing but all formulas and pretty damn flawless)
Good stability (I held 125 players on a 1GB ram Vps)
All updated interfaces with correct hovers and such
Unique feautures
A skill base for all skills and some skills worked on

(Bosses)

  • King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects
  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • 85% Godwars
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows{prizes glitchy still} & More…

Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat

  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
  • Switching better than RS
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)

Random Stuff:

  • All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
  • Quick Chat 100%
  • music everyone knows that

Armours/Bosses:

  • All new 711 armours obv we all know
  • Bosses are upgraded to new looks
  • Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats
  • Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now
  • Quests are partially made[/center]

sever2.png767×490

sever1.png763×505

server6.png763×504

server3.png764×503

Server14.png762×502

Sever13.png760×505

[center]Why should you choose to play Viturix over other servers?
A very good question… But a very simple answer Viturix cares about it’s players, it cares about it’s economy, it cares about how the server is ran and what the players suggest and what they want. We do every we possible can to ensure the players of Viturix enjoy playing the game and get the most friendly, fun and enjoyable game play they can!

The server does frequent and daily updates almost every day, you can view all/most of the updates that happen on Viturix on the update-log. Viturix focus’s on every players enjoyment, we have every aspect of game-play that we know players enjoy PvM, PvP, skilling, you name it we have it! We are not like other servers which are ignorant to there players and just ignores there opinions and even ignores there players when they talk to them… I have played over 50 servers over the past 4 years and have watched very carefully how the best servers are ran and also how to bad servers are ran, I have learnt there mistakes and adapted to how the best servers are ran which is why Viturix is the place for you.[/center]

inb4 leeched
